com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.idp

Class IDPAccountPickerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.AccountSwitcherActivity
        • com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.idp.IDPAccountPickerActivity

  • public class IDPAccountPickerActivity
extends AccountSwitcherActivity
    This class provides UI to select an existing signed in user account, or add a new account. It kicks off the IDP authentication flow once the selection is made. This screen is popped off the activity stack once the flow is complete, passing back control to the SP app.
    Author:
    bhariharan
